text:
Thanos Aka Josh Brolin Wishes Happy Holi To Fans In India By Posting A Perfect Throwback Picture!
Thanos Aka Josh Brolin Wishes Happy Holi To Fans In India By Posting A Perfect Throwback Picture!
The charm and excitement of Indian festivals isn't just restricted to India but there are big fans out everywhere, in every part of the world. Joining the bandwagon of Holi fans is actor Josh Brolin.
To wish his fans back in India, Avengers Endgame star Josh Brolin, took to Instagram to share a perfect throwback picture of him from his visit to India in 2013. As soon as the picture was shared, his fans started to flood him with adorable comments!
Fans are all the more excitement as the release date of Avengers: Endgame is heading closer to its official release.
And to wish all his fans, he posted a throwback picture.
Don't Miss 1.7 K SHARES 1.2 K SHARES 12.5 K SHARES 5.5 K SHARES 3.4 K SHARES
title: Thanos Aka Josh Brolin Wishes Happy Holi To Fans In India By Posting A Perfect Throwback Picture!
